data.eml:eml: Borkhauseniacrimnodes Meyrick, 1912 (Lepidoptera, Oecophoridae), a southern hemisphere species resident in Portugal

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Corley, Martin F. V., Ferreira, Sonia, Lvovsky, Alexander L., Rosete, Jorge (2017): Borkhauseniacrimnodes Meyrick, 1912 (Lepidoptera, Oecophoridae), a southern hemisphere species resident in Portugal. Nota Lepidopterologica 40 (1): 15-24, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/nl.40.10938, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/nl.40.10938
